about.name: Andy Deng
about.title: CS Student @ Boston College
about.description: Andy Deng is a current sophomore at Boston College studying computer science and finance. His hobbies include running, cooking, photography, gaming, and trying out new restaurants!
about.interests_desc: Interests: Web Development, Machine Learning, Cryptography, and Graphics/Visual computing, though currently uncertain of which field to focus on.
